CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The results demonstrated that the combination of IDT and NT with appropriate spacers was a promising molecular design strategy for the application of solar cells .

Let's think step by step.

1. IDT: Iodine-doped Tin Oxide (or Indium-doped Tin Oxide) - a common material used as a transparent conductive electrode in solar cells.
2. NT: Nanotubes - a type of material, often carbon nanotubes, which can be used as spacers or conductive materials in solar cells.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "IDT (Iodine-doped Tin Oxide)" and "NT (Nanotubes)".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
The results demonstrated that the combination of IDT (Iodine-doped Tin Oxide) and NT (Nanotubes) was a promising molecular design strategy for the application of solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Iodine-doped Tin Oxide (IDT) |
| Nanotubes (NT) |

2. NT (Nanotubes)
3. Appropriate spacers (unspecified material or substance used to create a suitable distance between IDT and NT)
4. Solar cells (an electrical device that converts sunlight into electricity)

2. Appropriate spacers - property: unspecified material or substance

The results demonstrated that the combination of IDT and appropriate spacers was a promising molecular design strategy for solar cells.

(Note: In this context, "IDT" and "appropriate spacers" are considered material entities as they are the substances involved in the molecular design strategy for solar cells.)
